channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI Is Reshaping SaaS Pricing: Why Per-Seat Models No Longer Fit
item.description: To support AI-empowered solopreneurs and small businesses, SaaS companies must move beyond per-seat pricing.

item.title: Beyond Prompt Engineering: How CTOs Can Optimize LLMs For Maximum Impact
item.description: Deeply integrating LLMs into your business means tackling performance at multiple levels—from token efficiency to infrastructure resilience.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Pro: Latest Leaks Claim To Show Updated Design
item.description: A new render of the iPhone 17 Pro claims to show exactly what the new camera panel will look like.

item.title: Stop Using Your Password — 800 Million Stolen Passwords Listed Online
item.description: Your password could already be compromised — act now.

item.title: Why People Analytics Haven't Lived Up To Expectations
item.description: To drive operational and financial impact, organizations need an enterprise-wide system of record grounded in objective workforce data.
